functional_jobs.job_statement: When attending events, I want to easily find event times, so I can plan my schedule without confusion.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the website and app to check event details.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Event times are not prominently displayed, requiring extra steps to find them.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Quick access to event times without needing to navigate multiple screens.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Event times are clearly visible at a glance directly on the event listing.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When moving to a new place, I want to feel welcomed and connected, so I can enjoy my new environment.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Joining the newcomers club and attending events.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in finding relevant activities causes stress and a feeling of disconnect.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Feelings of belonging and community through easier access to events.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Increased participation at events and positive feedback about feeling welcomed.

social_jobs.job_statement: When meeting new people, I want to be perceived as knowledgeable about local activities, so I can build connections.
social_jobs.current_solution: Engaging with the newcomers club and attending events.
social_jobs.pain_points: Not being informed about new events leads to missing opportunities to engage.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Ability to share information about local events confidently with others.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Frequent participation in conversations about local activities and being sought out for recommendations.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When organizing events, I want to efficiently manage registrations and communications, so I can ensure smooth operation.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Using the app and website for managing sign-ups.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Complex registration processes and overwhelming email notifications make management difficult.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Streamlined processes for registration and clearer communication.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Increased efficiency in managing events with fewer errors in registrations and communications.
